targets.queryText:
SELECT
  -- 1xx Informational
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '100' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "100",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '101' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "101",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '102' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "102",

  -- 2xx Success
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '200' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "200",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '201' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "201",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '202' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "202",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '203' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "203",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '204' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "204",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '205' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "205",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '206' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "206",

  -- 3xx Redirection
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '300' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "300",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '301' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "301",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '302' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "302",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '303' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "303",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '304' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "304",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '305' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "305",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '307' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "307",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '308' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "308",

  -- 4xx Client Errors
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '400' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "400",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '401' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "401",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '402' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "402",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '403' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "403",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '404' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "404",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '405' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "405",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '406' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "406",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '407' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "407",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '408' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "408",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '409' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "409",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '410' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "410",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '411' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "411",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '412' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "412",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '413' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "413",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '414' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "414",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '415' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "415",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '416' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "416",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '417' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "417",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '418' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "418",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '422' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "422",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '426' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "426",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '429' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "429",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '431' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "431",

  -- 5xx Server Errors
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '500' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "500",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '501' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "501",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '502' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "502",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '503' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "503",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '504' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "504",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '505' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "505",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '507' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "507",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '508' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "508",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '510' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "510",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '511' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "511"

FROM responses
LEFT JOIN requests ON responses.reqid = requests.id
WHERE 
    runid = $runid AND
    path IN (${endpoint:sqlstring})
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT
  -- 1xx Informational
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '100' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "100",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '101' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "101",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '102' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "102",

  -- 2xx Success
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '200' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "200",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '201' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "201",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '202' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "202",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '203' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "203",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '204' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "204",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '205' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "205",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '206' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "206",

  -- 3xx Redirection
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '300' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "300",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '301' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "301",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '302' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "302",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '303' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "303",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '304' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "304",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '305' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "305",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '307' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "307",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '308' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "308",

  -- 4xx Client Errors
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '400' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "400",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '401' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "401",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '402' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "402",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '403' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "403",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '404' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "404",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '405' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "405",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '406' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "406",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '407' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "407",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '408' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "408",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '409' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "409",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '410' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "410",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '411' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "411",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '412' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "412",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '413' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "413",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '414' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "414",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '415' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "415",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '416' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "416",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '417' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "417",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '418' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "418",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '422' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "422",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '426' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "426",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '429' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "429",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '431' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "431",

  -- 5xx Server Errors
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '500' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "500",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '501' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "501",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '502' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "502",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '503' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "503",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '504' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "504",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '505' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "505",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '507' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "507",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '508' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "508",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '510' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "510",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = '511' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "511"

FROM responses
LEFT JOIN requests ON responses.reqid = requests.id
WHERE 
    runid = $runid AND
    path IN (${endpoint:sqlstring})

targets.queryText:
SELECT 
    path as metric,
    count(1) filter(where status BETWEEN 400 AND 499) as "4xx",
    count(1) filter(where status BETWEEN 500 AND 599) as "5xx",
    count(1) filter(where status BETWEEN 200 AND 299) as "2xx",
    count(1) filter(where status NOT BETWEEN 400 AND 599 AND status NOT BETWEEN 200 AND 299) as other
FROM 
    requests LEFT JOIN responses ON responses.reqid = requests.id
WHERE 
    runid = $runid AND
    path IN (${endpoint:sqlstring})
GROUP BY path
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT 
    path as metric,
    count(1) filter(where status BETWEEN 400 AND 499) as "4xx",
    count(1) filter(where status BETWEEN 500 AND 599) as "5xx",
    count(1) filter(where status BETWEEN 200 AND 299) as "2xx",
    count(1) filter(where status NOT BETWEEN 400 AND 599 AND status NOT BETWEEN 200 AND 299) as other
FROM 
    requests LEFT JOIN responses ON responses.reqid = requests.id
WHERE 
    runid = $runid AND
    path IN (${endpoint:sqlstring})
GROUP BY path

targets.queryText:
SELECT
  strftime('%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ', timestamp) as time,
  100.0 * endpoint_coverage / endpoint_coverage_total AS "Endpoint Coverage (%)",
  100.0 * line_coverage / line_coverage_total AS "Line Coverage (%)"
FROM
  coverage
WHERE
  runid = "$runid"
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT
  strftime('%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ', timestamp) as time,
  100.0 * endpoint_coverage / endpoint_coverage_total AS "Endpoint Coverage (%)",
  100.0 * line_coverage / line_coverage_total AS "Line Coverage (%)"
FROM
  coverage
WHERE
  runid = "$runid"

targets.queryText:
SELECT 
    path as path,
    CAST(status AS TEXT) as status,
    count(1) as count
FROM 
    requests LEFT JOIN responses ON responses.reqid = requests.id
WHERE 
    runid = $runid AND
    path IN (${endpoint:sqlstring})
GROUP BY path, status
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT 
    path as path,
    CAST(status AS TEXT) as status,
    count(1) as count
FROM 
    requests LEFT JOIN responses ON responses.reqid = requests.id
WHERE 
    runid = $runid AND
    path IN (${endpoint:sqlstring})
GROUP BY path, status

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT path FROM requests WHERE runid = $runid ORDER BY path ASC
list.label: Endpoint
list.name: endpoint
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT path FROM requests WHERE runid = $runid ORDER BY path ASC
